name: Bomb Frog
description:
Collect bombs and use them to uncover hidden treasure and vanquish ghosts. Collect enough treasure to progress to the next level - a target number is displayed in the lower left of the game.

Look for secrets! Beware the fearsome black ghosts!

Controls are included in the game. There are 8 levels of increasing difficulty.

Made for 8 Bits To Infinity's Mashup Jam 2019.
